data.prayer: Father, please send new teachers into the harvest, who can correct the lies of our enemy in the state of Saint Saviour, Guernsey.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Saint Saviour, Guernsey
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Spirit, of the 1,512 people in the state of Saint Saviour who claim Christianity, challenge some of them to pick up your Word and read it for themselves today.
data.verse: Then you will know the truth, and the truth will set you free.

data.prayer: Father, you gave the church of Saint Saviour, Guernsey the greatest shepherd of all time, Jesus. Please, help them listen to him.
data.verse: I will place over them one shepherd, my servant David, and he will tend them; he will tend them and be their shepherd.

data.prayer: Over 2 percent of the people of Saint Saviour are far from Jesus.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in Saint Saviour, Guernsey to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Saint Saviour, Guernsey to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the state of Saint Saviour be filled with simple churches in every neighborhood.
data.verse: For the earth will be full of the knowledge of the Lord, as the waters cover the sea.

data.section_summary:
the state of Saint Saviour, Guernsey has a population of 2,800.

We estimate Saint Saviour has 1,232 people who might know Jesus, 1,512 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 56 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 2 neighbors who need Jesus.
